name: Design Your Own Art Class
description: The Cartoon Art Museum offers customized workshops to institutions and to the public. Cartooning workshops and a self-guided or docent-led group visit to the museum can be folded into your teaching curriculum, programming, team building, or after-school programs through creative hands-on activities and their career applications. The Cartoon Art Museum can also work with your school, library, business or child-care facility to bring a cartooning instructor to your location. Workshops with 5 or mo

howToGetIt: To request a workshop, use the form below, call 415-CARTOON, or email office@cartoonart.org. To schedule workshop fill out ONLINE FORM
cost: This is a fee based service. The cost of a workshop is $550 ($275 for educational groups) which includes admission to the galleries.
